name: One-key-to-setup-vim-config
tagline: One-key to set up an Efficient Vim Coding Environment.(Pathogen,NERDTree,MiniBufExplorer,Vim-powerline,Vim-markdown)
body:
# Intro

One-key to set up an Efficient Vim Coding Environment.

Apps:
- Pathogen
- NERDTree
- MiniBufExplorer
- Vim-powerline
- Vim-markdown

# How to use

1.Just `cd` into the directory which you clone.

2.RUN:
```BASH
    bash vim_config.sh
```

3.ENJOY IT !
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
